textBeforeTable: TimeComX is available as Basic and as Professional Edition. Events like processor and network usage, process activity or the end of a defined countdown can shutdown your computer, execute other programs or play audio files. What is TimeComX? Our award winning automation application enables you to plan fast and easy various tasks. Pro Basic Overview TimeComX Shareware4U Recommended Links Stay in touch Subscribe to our newsletter to receive all the latest on new products and offers.
textAfterTable: TimeComX Basic You are looking for an automation tool, which is easy to operate, resource friendly but also powerful? TimeComX will help you out. It can perform various tasks after specified time, process activity or by a lower deviation of processor/network usage and input device activity. Most important tasks at a glance: • Restart, Shutdown • Log Off, Lock Computer • Hibernation, Sleep mode • Wake up & play alarms sounds • Play any type of audio file (wav,mp3,wma..) • Open files (e.g. batch files) or websites • Create screenshots before starting a task This software has been designed to be portable.So you can run TimeComX e.g. on a flash device. TimeComX Basic is completely free for personal and commercial use. We guarantee that our products do not contain any spyware, adware, malware or any other type of software that can harm your computer. Changelog Screenshot FAQs Translation
